items.headline: Tom Lee says there were five big reasons why markets stumbled. He has familiar advice.
items.summary_en: Fundstrat’s Tom Lee says investors should not fear this market, but be ready to buy the dip.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘There’s a lot of tension’: My brother and I manage a $5 million trust. How do we solve our many disagreements?
items.summary_en: “We have a good estate attorney, but he just repeats the facts; we need someone to help with the feelings.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: The late Ozzy Osbourne’s swanky L.A. condo is for sale for $2.4 million
items.summary_en: Ozzy Osbourne’s stunning West Hollywood, Calif., condo is on the market for $2.375 million, four months after the rock ‘n’ roll legend died in his native England.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Strategist warns of capital flight risk from Japan, drawing parallels with Liz Truss era
items.summary_en: New Japanese Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi differs from Truss in that she wants to spend rather than cut taxes, but both plans amount to aggressive fiscal stimulus, says Deutsche Bank.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘We almost lost $10,000’: My late father-in-law’s company claimed his life-insurance policy didn’t exist. It did.
items.summary_en: “The company changed names several times, and it was very difficult tracking them down for payment of benefits.”
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Gap says higher-income shoppers are visiting its namesake stores, while lower-income ones go to Old Navy
items.summary_en: Shares of Gap Inc. rallied after hours on Thursday after the clothing chain offered a more upbeat full-year outlook, saying that strong momentum in most of its stores has set it up well for the holiday shopping season.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: Another off-price retailer just turned more optimistic about its future. Bargain hunting is the name of the game.
items.summary_en: Plenty of analysts believe that Ross Stores stands to benefit as people see prices creeping up elsewhere in their budgets and decide to trade down in apparel.
items.next_en: Next: watch scheduled data (CPI/Jobs/Fed) or company guidance.

items.headline: ‘He lived alone in Section 8 housing’: My late uncle’s landlord disposed of his art collection. What can we do?
items.summary_en: “The management company said they would store his belongings.”

items.headline: These two corners of the stock market haven’t fallen this far together since 1990 — a cautious sign for the economy
items.summary_en: The consumer discretionary and consumer staples sectors now rank among the S&P 500’s bottom performers for 2025 — a sign that Wall Street sees cracks in the American wallet

items.headline: ‘Our mom is fuming’: Defying our dying mother’s wishes, our dad is leaving our family’s money to his church. How do we stop him?
items.summary_en: “This is not a money grab on our part.”
